title: Reliquiæ Baxterianæ, or, Mr. Richard Baxters narrative of the most memorable passages of his life and times faithfully publish'd from his own original manuscript by Matthew Sylvester.
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
publisher: Printed for T. Parkhurst, J. Robinson, F. Lawrence and F. Dunton,
notes: Reproduction of original in British Library.
Appendix: A reply to some exceptions against our Worcestershire agreement and my Christian concord, written by a nameless author and sent by Dr. Warmstrye.
